 上一个软件包   下一个软件包 框架    无框架    

软件包 com.jdon.domain.advsior

类摘要
ComponentAdvsior in container, when a component inject into another component or a model, the advisor will create a proxy for injected class with its interfaces.
ModelAdvisor when a model with a @Introduce annotation is injected to another model, the injected model will be enhanced using cglib.
